snippet: In a motion described as a placeholder, few details were offered about the reasons Dzhokhar Tsarnaev’s lawyers plan to use in arguing for a new trial.
abstract: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev request new trial; motion comes after Tsarnaev was sentenced to death in May for his role in 2013 Boston Marathon bombing.
lead_paragraph: In a motion described as a placeholder, few details were offered about the reasons Dzhokhar Tsarnaev’s lawyers plan to use in arguing for a new trial.

headline.main: New Trial Requested for Boston Marathon Bomber
headline.print_headline: New Trial Requested for Bomber in Boston
